title: Mooresville, North Carolina
summary: Mooresville is a large town located in the southwestern section of Iredell County, North Carolina, United States, and is a part of the fast-growing Charlotte Metro area. The population was 32,711 at the 2010 United States Census.[5] In 2019, the population had increased to 39,132,[6] making it the largest municipality in Iredell County. It is located approximately 25 miles (40Â km) north of Charlotte.
